meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lyn Thomas Allysen Meijer Ellen Kimmel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6055.

td.p: Lyn Thomas, a library assistant from Redmond, Washington
Allysen Meijer, a patient financial counselor from Santa Barbara, California
Ellen Kimmel, a school nurse from Nanuet, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,000)

tr.td: A YEAR ENDING IN 0
DOUBLE VOWELS
WINE FROM WHERE?
ELEMENT-ARY SCHOOL
THE COMPANY HE KEPT
COUNTING DOWN TO "MIDNIGHT"

(Alex: Sorry, wrong.)
[Laughter]

Russia

Lyn
